snippet.title: Iron Village Alpha Trailer - August 2024
snippet.description:
This is the gameplay trailer for Iron Village, our upcoming cozy town builder game... with trains!

Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3011060/Iron_Village/

Play the demo now on Itch.io: https://chappington.itch.io/iron-village-prototype
Join us on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/wF7HJbvRGF
Our website: https://lunarchippy.games
